entry.title: How and why I built a PyLadies avatar generator in 2 days
entry.summary:
Description

Mariana Bocoi, a DevOps infrastructure engineer and part of the PyLadies Stockholm community, shared her experience of creating a PyLadies avatar generator in just two intense days. She discussed the frustrations and ideas that led to this project, emphasizing the importance of inclusivity and diversity in tech representations. Mariana â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Mariana Bocoi, a DevOps infrastructure engineer and part of the PyLadies Stockholm community, shared her experience of creating a PyLadies avatar generator in just two intense days. She discussed the frustrations and ideas that led to this project, emphasizing the importance of inclusivity and diversity in tech representations. Mariana was inspired to create more representative avatars after realizing the limitations of existing logos in reflecting diverse identities.
